name: Goal
description: A goal is a collection of imperatives to execute until a given game state is reached.

name.title: Name
name.description: The human-friendly name of this goal.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.description: Require this condition to be met for the goal to be considered activatable.  Not all tasks take this into account, and goals may be manually started without meeting their requirements.

completedWhen.title: Completed When
completedWhen.description: This goal is considered complete when the given condition is satisfied.  Goals will automatically stop when completed.  Goals that do not specify this property will continue forever.

imperativeSets.title: Imperative Sets
imperativeSets.description: A collection of collection of imperatives.  These imperatives will be added to the goal's own imperatives.  Typically, this is a list whose elements are !import tags on items in the imperative-sets folder.

imperatives.title: Imperatives
imperatives.description: A list of imperatives this goal will provide.  Imperatives are the mechanism by which the goal triggers gameplay mechanics.
